languages.text: "Ты испортил{mf||а} прием, который так старательно подготовила наша маленькая бедная Тазарра. Теперь суккуба мечтает лично затащить тебя в Комморру и как следует поразвлечься. Каково будет ее разочарование, если с тобой что-то случится до этого момента... Впрочем, зачем торопить события? Прежде, мон-кай, позволь разглядеть тебя получше".

traits.locale_text: "Да, все так... ты испортил{mf||а} прием, который так старательно подготовила наша маленькая бедная Тазарра. Теперь суккуба мечтает лично затащить тебя в Комморру и как следует поразвлечься. Каково будет ее разочарование, если с тобой что-то случится до этого момента... Впрочем, зачем торопить события? Прежде, мон-кай, позволь разглядеть тебя получше".

languages.text: "You ruined the reception that our poor little Tazarra had worked so hard to arrange. Now it is the Succubus's dream to drag you to Commorragh and have her way with you. What a terrible disappointment it would be for her if something were to happen to you before then... But we should not get ahead of ourselves, yes? First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."
languages.original_text: "Ты испортил{mf||а} прием, который так старательно подготовила наша маленькая бедная Тазарра. Теперь суккуба мечтает лично затащить тебя в Комморру и как следует поразвлечься. Каково будет ее разочарование, если с тобой что-то случится до этого момента... Впрочем, зачем торопить события? Прежде, мон-кай, позволь разглядеть тебя получше".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, quite right... you ruined the reception that our poor little Tazarra had worked to hard to arrange. Now it is the Succubus's dream to drag you to Commorragh and have her way with you. What a terrible disappointment it would be for her if something were to happen to you before then... But we should not get ahead of ourselves, yes? First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."

First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."

What a terrible disappointment it would be for her if something were to happen to you before then... But we should not get ahead of ourselves, yes? First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."

languages.text: «Echaste a perder la recepción que con tanto mimo había preparado la pobre Tazarra. Ahora, esa Súcubo solo sueña con arrastrarte a Commorragh y hacer lo que quiera contigo. Sería una decepción para ella que te pasara algo antes... pero no nos adelantemos. Primero quiero echarte un vistazo, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "You ruined the reception that our poor little Tazarra had worked so hard to arrange. Now it is the Succubus's dream to drag you to Commorragh and have her way with you. What a terrible disappointment it would be for her if something were to happen to you before then... But we should not get ahead of ourselves, yes? First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."

traits.locale_text: «Echaste a perder la recepción que con tanto mimo había preparado la pobre Tazarra. Ahora, esa Súcubo solo sueña con arrastrarte a Commorragh y hacer lo que quiera contigo. Sería una decepción para ella que te pasara algo antes... pero no nos adelantemos. Primero quiero echarte un vistazo, mon-keigh».

languages.text: “你毁了我们可怜的小塔扎菈辛辛苦苦安排的招待会。现在，那位血腥魔女最渴望的事情，就是把你带到科摩罗，好好安排你一番。如果你在那之前就出了意外，她会多么失望啊……不过，咱们先不要离题太远了，你觉得呢？首先，让我先好好看看你吧，猴子。”
languages.original_text: "You ruined the reception that our poor little Tazarra had worked so hard to arrange. Now it is the Succubus's dream to drag you to Commorragh and have her way with you. What a terrible disappointment it would be for her if something were to happen to you before then... But we should not get ahead of ourselves, yes? First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."

traits.locale_text: “你毁了我们可怜的小塔扎菈辛辛苦苦安排的招待会。现在，那位血腥魔女最渴望的事情，就是把你带到科摩罗，好好安排你一番。如果你在那之前就出了意外，她会多么失望啊……不过，咱们先不要离题太远了，你觉得呢？首先，让我先好好看看你吧，猴子。”

languages.text: 「お前は哀れなタザーラが懸命に用意した歓待を台無しにした。そしてサキュバスはお前をコモラフに引きずり込み、思い通りに蹂躙するよう夢みている。その前にお前の身に何かあったら、あいつだって酷く残念に思うはず…しかし、急いではいけない。モン＝ケイよ、まずはお前の顔をよく見せろ」
languages.original_text: "You ruined the reception that our poor little Tazarra had worked so hard to arrange. Now it is the Succubus's dream to drag you to Commorragh and have her way with you. What a terrible disappointment it would be for her if something were to happen to you before then... But we should not get ahead of ourselves, yes? First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は哀れなタザーラが懸命に用意した歓待を台無しにした。そしてサキュバスはお前をコモラフに引きずり込み、思い通りに蹂躙するよう夢みている。その前にお前の身に何かあったら、あいつだって酷く残念に思うはず…しかし、急いではいけない。モン＝ケイよ、まずはお前の顔をよく見せろ」

languages.text: "Ihr habt den Empfang ruiniert, den unsere arme kleine Tazarra so mühsam vorbereitet hatte. Und jetzt träumt der Succubus davon, Euch nach Commorragh zu zerren und mit Euch zu spielen. Es wäre für sie eine furchtbare Enttäuschung, wenn Euch vorher etwas zustieße ... Aber alles der Reihe nach, richtig? Lasst Euch zunächst einmal richtig ansehen, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: "You ruined the reception that our poor little Tazarra had worked so hard to arrange. Now it is the Succubus's dream to drag you to Commorragh and have her way with you. What a terrible disappointment it would be for her if something were to happen to you before then... But we should not get ahead of ourselves, yes? First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt den Empfang ruiniert, den unsere arme kleine Tazarra so mühsam vorbereitet hatte. Und jetzt träumt der Succubus davon, Euch nach Commorragh zu zerren und mit Euch zu spielen. Es wäre für sie eine furchtbare Enttäuschung, wenn Euch vorher etwas zustieße ... Aber alles der Reihe nach, richtig? Lasst Euch zunächst einmal richtig ansehen, Chem-Pan-Sey."

languages.original_text: "You ruined the reception that our poor little Tazarra had worked so hard to arrange. Now it is the Succubus's dream to drag you to Commorragh and have her way with you. What a terrible disappointment it would be for her if something were to happen to you before then... But we should not get ahead of ourselves, yes? First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."

languages.text: « Vous avez gâché la réception que notre pauvre petite Tazarra avait organisée au prix de tant d'efforts. Maintenant, cette succube rêve de vous traîner à Commorragh pour s'amuser avec vous. Elle serait terriblement déçue s'il vous arrivait malheur avant qu'elle n'en ait eu l'occasion... Mais chaque chose en son temps, si vous le voulez bien. Pour le moment, mon-keigh, permettez-moi de vous observer de plus près. »
languages.original_text: "You ruined the reception that our poor little Tazarra had worked so hard to arrange. Now it is the Succubus's dream to drag you to Commorragh and have her way with you. What a terrible disappointment it would be for her if something were to happen to you before then... But we should not get ahead of ourselves, yes? First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez gâché la réception que notre pauvre petite Tazarra avait organisée au prix de tant d'efforts. Maintenant, cette succube rêve de vous traîner à Commorragh pour s'amuser avec vous. Elle serait terriblement déçue s'il vous arrivait malheur avant qu'elle n'en ait eu l'occasion... Mais chaque chose en son temps, si vous le voulez bien. Pour le moment, mon-keigh, permettez-moi de vous observer de plus près. »

languages.text: "Zavallı Tazarra'nın onca çaba sarf ederek düzenlediği merasimi berbat ettin. Artık Sakkubus'un tek arzusu, seni Commoragh'a sürüklemek ve icabına bakmak. O sana ulaşamadan başına bir şey gelse ne de yazık olurdu... Elbette aceleci davranmaya gerek yok. Mon-keigh, sana baştan aşağı iyice bir bakayım önce."
languages.original_text: "You ruined the reception that our poor little Tazarra had worked so hard to arrange. Now it is the Succubus's dream to drag you to Commorragh and have her way with you. What a terrible disappointment it would be for her if something were to happen to you before then... But we should not get ahead of ourselves, yes? First, mon-keigh, allow me to get a good look at you."

traits.locale_text: "Zavallı Tazarra'nın onca çaba sarf ederek düzenlediği merasimi berbat ettin. Artık Sukkubus'ın tek arzusu, seni Commoragh'a sürüklemek ve icabına bakmak. O sana ulaşamadan başına bir şey gelse ne de yazık olurdu... Elbette aceleci davranmaya gerek yok. Mon-keigh, sana baştan aşağı iyice bir bakayım önce."
